key_risks: Regulatory and legal challenges due to global operations and virtual model
High stock volatility and valuation concerns
Dependence on agent recruitment and retention
Criticism of the sustainability of the virtual brokerage model
controversies: Lawsuits alleging sexual misconduct by agents
Fraud lawsuit related to home renovations
social_issues: Lawsuits alleging sexual misconduct and accusations of ignoring such behavior
governance_issues: Questions about internal oversight and ethical standards
